$schema.description: Optional JSON Schema reference for this config file.

auditors.description: Mapping from auditor name to its configuration.

validators.description: Mapping from validator name to its source path.

formatters.description: Paths to formatter definitions and associated schemas.

plan.description: Path to the canonical plan formatter markdown.

schema.description: Path to the JSON Schema used to validate plans.

model.description: Optional model override for formatter stage.

exclude.description: List of files or folders to exclude from plans.

commands.description: Shell commands used for linting and testing.

commandsFailOnly.description: Optional commands that produce concise, failure-focused output for build/test/lint.

build.description: Alternative build/typecheck command optimized for short, failure-only output.

lint.description: Alternative lint command optimized for short, failure-only output.

test.description: Alternative test command optimized for short, failure-only output.

enableBuild.description: Whether build should be run during validation loops.

enableLint.description: Whether lint should be run during validation loops.

enableTest.description: Whether tests should be run during validation loops.

runBaselineQualityGate.description: Whether to run a full build/test/lint cycle once before any auditors execute.

maxValidationRetries.description: Maximum number of attempts allowed in the lint/test validation loop per step.

maxRegressionAttempts.description: Maximum number of regression-fix attempts allowed per step (0 means unbounded).

maxThreadLifetimeAttempts.description: Upper bound on Codex executor invocations (apply + fix_regression) per step (0 means unbounded).

enabled.description: Whether this auditor is active in the pipeline.

path.description: Path to the auditor prompt or definition file.

validators.description: Ordered list of validator names to apply to this auditor's plans.

model.description: Optional model override for this auditor.
